headline: A Look at American Water Works Company’s Valuation Following Strong Q3 Results and Confident 2026 Guidance
summary: American Water Works Company just announced a solid set of financial results, showcasing year-over-year growth in both sales and net income for the third quarter and first nine months of 2025. The company also shared 2026 guidance, calling for even higher earnings per share. See our latest analysis for American Water Works Company. American Water Works Company’s solid earnings update and confident 2026 outlook come after a year of some ups and downs for investors. The latest share price...
